# Aufgabe

Importieren Sie den Datensatz `mariokart` in R.
Berechnen Sie den mittleren Verkaufspreis (`total_pr`) für *neue* Spiele.

Hinweise:

- Runden Sie auf 1 Dezimalstelle.



</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>

# Lösung

Pakete starten:


::: {.cell hash='mariokart-mean2_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_4eb10d00b637f9d379bbc4da32614b06'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(easystats)
```
:::



Daten importieren:


::: {.cell hash='mariokart-mean2_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_1e5cc9d297ab848c23022a23c4121ba7'}

```{.r .cell-code}
d_url <- "https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/csv/openintro/mariokart.csv"
d <- data_read(d_url)
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='mariokart-mean2_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_d43d2f444113e5c486e2a555d80f4edc'}

```{.r .cell-code}
solution <-
d  %>% 
  filter(cond == "new") %>% 
  summarise(pr_mean = mean(total_pr))

solution
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
   pr_mean
1 53.77068
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='mariokart-mean2_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_45ec65dbef716d9ea1f07edaa1b2e9b4'}

:::


**Lösung:** 53.77.
